txt.en: You have gathered the notices, and should now begin posting them
Notices can be posted in places all around Lake-town.\n\nYou should post notices around Lake-town.
The stack of notices is in the guards' barracks in Lake-town.\n\nYou should collect the stack of notices.
Collect the stack of notices in the guards' barracks
With the Dale-lands as lively as ever, Captain Álarr has asked you to aid him in posting more guards' notices and orders from the Master throughout Lake-town.
'Back again, are you? I have orders from the Master and a bunch of notices that need posting... and soon!\n\n'What do you say, [placeholder]?'
Captain Álarr can be found in the Guards' Barracks in Lake-town.\n\nYou should return to Álarr and inform him that the notices are posted.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
'Yes, yes, I trust that you posted them. You'll be wanting this, I presume?'
